track.name: Hellhound On My Trail
comments: Brilliant.

Just close your eyes and feel him.
Takes me back.
If this doesn't give you shivers, then I don't know what will.
@luckylollyme We share the sentiment but 'awesome' is not a verb. o_O
The roots of the blues tree right here !!!! You can't just play the blues you have to feel the blues and robert did both !!!!
so many verbs to describe this.... I think I'll use AWESOME!!!
This is timeless.
Robert Johnson vs. Charley Patton steel cage death match, OK not really
this song is creepiest
A SHAKEY FEELING .
lOve
One of the greatest recordings of the last century.  Simple.
RoJo . . . Hell yeah!
well said pal.  The blues has no appetite for food.

What an absolutely awesome song. Man, I was eating my bagel, ham & cheese sandwich yesterday and instead of enjoying what is normally a great meal I was thinking about my broken down car, my lack of funds and why my girl kicks me when I’m down. When you can’t enjoy your food, you know you got the blues. If you stop and look back, you see a hell hound one step behind, where better to go then right here?

“Mmmmmm blues fall’n down like on hail…” I feel you there Robert. Man, thank god there is the blues to listen to. Sometimes the soul aches and there isn’t much else one can do but listen to some awesome tunes like this.

Good, roots and true!!!!
Eu gosto e não tem pra ninguém.
Um abraço pra qualquer um do mundo que também gosta do maldito Robert Johnson!!!
terrible!!!
THE BLUES!
